
# Welcome to the dev-version of the [library flip on CRAN](http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/flip/index.html)



To **install** this github version type (in R):

`install.packages("devtools")` if you don't already have it.

`library(devtools)`

`install_github("flip", "livioivil")`



**Some examples**

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(flip)
```
An univarite analysis
```{r}
set.seed(1)
y=rnorm(10)+.5
res=flip(y)
summary(res)
plot(res) # same ad hist(res)
```

A multivarite analysis
```{r}
set.seed(1)
df=data.frame(y1=rnorm(10)+.5,y2=rnorm(10))
res=flip(~.,data=df)
summary(res)
plot(res) 
# which is different from 
hist(res)
```
